subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: A goal by Patrice Bergeron at 15 minutes 19 seconds of the second overtime gave the Bruins a stirring and exhausting victory over Pittsburgh, as well as a 3-0 lead in the series.
snippet: A goal by Patrice Bergeron at 15 minutes 19 seconds of the second overtime gave the Bruins a stirring and exhausting victory over Pittsburgh, as well as a 3-0 lead in the series.
